title: r/AmITheA**hole For Refusing To Name My Baby "Karen?"
description: r/AmITheA**hole OP's wife is about to give birth to a newborn baby girl. OP's wife wants to name the girl "Karen," because it's a family name. OP puts his foot down and refuses to name is daughter Karen. This leads to a blow-up fight between him and his wife, which leaves OP wondering if he's being too harsh about the name. Is growing up as a "Karen" really that bad? If you like this content, be sure to follow for more daily Reddit stories!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
